general.quote: Simplicity is the key to brilliance.
general.author: Bruce Lee

general.quote: There is no end. There is no beginning. There is only the infinite passion of life.
general.author: Federico Fellini

general.quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
general.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

general.quote: For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness.
general.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

general.quote: When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us.
general.author: Helen Keller

general.quote: We're all a little weird. And life is a little weird. And when we find someone whose weirdness is compatible with ours, we join up with them and fall into mutually satisfying weirdness – and call it love – true love.
general.author: Robert Fulghum

general.quote: People are just as happy as they make up their minds to be.
general.author: Abraham Lincoln

general.quote: The truth is, everyone is going to hurt you. You just got to find the ones worth suffering for.
general.author: Bob Marley

general.quote: It is impossible to live without failing at something, unless you live so cautiously that you might as well not have lived at all – in which case, you fail by default.
general.author: J.K. Rowling

general.quote: The question isn't who is going to let me; it's who is going to stop me.
general.author: Ayn Rand

general.quote: A reader lives a thousand lives before he dies, said Jojen. The man who never reads lives only one.
general.author: George R.R. Martin

general.quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
general.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

general.quote: The more things are forbidden, the more popular they become.
general.author: Mark Twain

general.quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
general.author: Lao Tzu

general.quote: If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it. And, like any great relationship, it just gets better and better as the years roll on.
general.author: Steve Jobs

general.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
general.author: George Eliot

general.quote: If you can't explain it to a six year old, you don't understand it yourself.
general.author: Albert Einstein

general.quote: We don't see things as they are, we see them as we are.
general.author: Ana's Nin

general.quote: Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own.
general.author: Robert A. Heinlein

general.quote: Not all of us can do great things. But we can do small things with great love.
general.author: Mother Teresa

general.quote: If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you.
general.author: A.A. Milne

general.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
general.author: Albert Einstein

general.quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: It Goes On.
general.author: Robert Frost

general.quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
general.author: Mae West

general.quote: Today you are You, that is truer than true. There is no one alive who is Youer than You.
general.author: Dr. Seuss

general.quote: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth.
general.author: William W. Purkey

general.quote: There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.
general.author: Albert Einstein

general.quote: Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life.
general.author: Mark Twain

general.quote: Life is what happens to us while we are making other plans.
general.author: Allen Saunders

general.quote: Sometimes the questions are complicated and the answers are simple.
general.author: Dr. Seuss

general.quote: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
general.author: Dr. Seuss

general.quote: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
general.author: George Bernard Shaw

general.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
general.author: Winston S. Churchill

general.quote: I can't give you a sure-fire formula for success, but I can give you a formula for failure: try to please everybody all the time.
general.author: Herbert Bayard Swope

general.quote: If at first you don't succeed, try, try again. Then quit. No use being a damn fool about it.
general.author: W.C. Fields

general.quote: Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value.
general.author: Albert Einstein

general.quote: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.
general.author: Herman Melville

general.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
general.author: Henry David Thoreau

general.quote: As he read, I fell in love the way you fall asleep: slowly, and then all at once.
general.author: John Green, The Fault in Our Stars

general.quote: There is never a time or place for true love. It happens accidentally, in a heartbeat, in a single flashing, throbbing moment.
general.author: Sarah Dessen, The Truth About Forever

general.quote: It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not.
general.author: André Gide, Autumn Leaves

general.quote: Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it.
general.author: Nicholas Sparks, A Walk to Remember

general.quote: If you can make a woman laugh, you can make her do anything.
general.author: Marilyn Monroe

general.quote: We are what we pretend to be, so we must be careful about what we pretend to be.
general.author: Kurt Vonnegut, Mother Night

general.quote: The flower that blooms in adversity is the rarest and most beautiful of all.
general.author: Walt Disney Company, Mulan

general.quote: We delight in the beauty of the butterfly, but rarely admit the changes it has gone through to achieve that beauty.
general.author: Maya Angelou

general.quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
general.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

general.quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
general.author: Thomas A. Edison

general.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: What seems to us as bitter trials are often blessings in disguise.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: Every Saint has a past, Every sinner has a future.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: The old believe everything, the middle aged suspect everything, the Young know everything.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: Experience is simply the name we give our mistakes.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: An idea that is not dangerous is unworthy of being called an idea at all.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: Nowadays people know the price of everything and the value of nothing.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: Life is too important to be taken seriously.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: To love oneself is the beginning of life long Romance.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: Never love anybody that treats you like you're ordinary.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: Moderation is a fatal thing. Nothing succeeds like excess.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: No man is rich enough to buy back his past.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: One should always play fairly when one has the winning cards.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: Everything popular is wrong.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: I have the simplest tastes. I am always satisfied with the best.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: The artist is the creator of beautiful things.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: With Freedom Books Flowers and the Moon who could not be happy?
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: Women are meant to be loved, not to be understood.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: Where there is no love there is no understanding.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: Abundance is not something we acquire. It is something we tune into.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: I cannot always control what goes on outside. But I can always control what goes on inside.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: The Laws Of Attraction is this. You don't attract what you want, you attract what you are.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: When you change the way you look at things, the things you look at change.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: When you have a choice whether to be Right or to be Kind, choose to be Kind.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Doing what you love is the cornerstone of having abundance in your life.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Everything is in motion. Everything flows. Everything is vibrating.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: I am realistic – I expect miracles.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Transformation literally means going beyond your form.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Happiness is not something that you get in Life, happiness is something that you bring to life.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: There is no way to happiness. Happiness is the way.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Happiness is not something that you get in life. Happiness is something that you bring to life.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Judgements prevent us from seeing the good that lies beyond appearances.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Keep your face to the sunshine and you will never see the shadow.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Stop acting as if Life is a rehearsal. Live this day as if it were your last. The past is over and Gone. The future is not guaranteed.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Where there is no love there is no understanding.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: You cannot be lonely if you like the person you are alone with.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Love is forgiving and love is for giving.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Loving people live in a loving world. Hostile people live in a hostile world. Same world.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: When you live on a round planet, there's no choosing sides.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Peace is the result of retraining your mind to process life as it is, rather than as you think it should be.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Successful people make money. It's not that people who make money become successful, but that successful people attract money. They bring success to what they do.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: The only limits you have all the limits you believe.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: One of the essential principles of living an inspired Life is to remember that our desires don't arrive on our schedule. They arrive when they're supposed to.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: As I unclutter my life, I free myself to answer the callings of my soul.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Don't die with your music still in you.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: You'll see it when you believe it!
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: When you judge another, you do not define Them, you define Yourself.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Be miserable or motivate yourself. Whatever has to be done, it's always your choice.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: You have to trust in something you are gut, destiny life, karma, whatever this approach has never let me down.
general.author: Steve Jobs

general.quote: People think focus means saying yes to the thing you have got to focus on. but that's not what it means at all. it means saying no to the hundred other good ideas that there are. You have to pick careful.
general.author: Steve Jobs

general.quote: Because the people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones who do.
general.author: Steve Jobs

general.quote: Everyone here has the sense that right now is one of those moments when we are influencing the future.
general.author: Steve Jobs

general.quote: My job is not to be easy on people. My job is to make them better.
general.author: Steve Jobs

general.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.
general.author: Steve Jobs

general.quote: If you live each day as if it was your last, someday you will most certainly be right.
general.author: Steve Jobs

general.quote: Let's go invent tomorrow rather than worrying about what happened yesterday.
general.author: Steve Jobs

general.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
general.author: Steve Jobs

general.quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
general.author: Steve Jobs

general.quote: Have the courage to follow your heart and intuition. They already know what you truly want to become.
general.author: Steve Jobs

general.quote: Don't let the noise of others opinions drown out your own inner voice.
general.author: Steve Jobs

general.quote: Deciding what not to do is as important as deciding what to do.
general.author: Steve Jobs

general.quote: That is very likely the single best invention of life it is Life's change agent.
general.author: Steve Jobs

general.quote: My favourite things in life don't cost any money. It's really clear that the most precious resource we all have is time.
general.author: Steve Jobs

general.quote: Walk as if you are kissing the Earth with your feet.
general.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

general.quote: Each morning we are born again, what we do today is what matters most.
general.author: Buddha

general.quote: Out beyond ideas of wrong doing and right doing there is a field. I'll meet you there. When the soul lies down in that grass the world is too full to talk about.
general.author: Rumi

general.quote: These mountains that you are carrying, you were only supposed to climb.
general.author: Najwa Zebian

general.quote: The quieter you become, the more you can hear.
general.author: Anonymous

general.quote: If you are depressed you are living in the past. If you are anxious you are living in the future. If you are at peace you are living in the present.
general.author: Lao Tzu

general.quote: Stress is an ignorant state. It believes that everything is an emergency. Nothing is that important.
general.author: Natalie Goldberg

general.quote: All that we are is the result of what we have thought
general.author: Buddha

general.quote: We are shaped by our thoughts; we become what we think. When the mind is pure, joy follows like a shadow that never leaves
general.author: Buddha

general.quote: Remember that sometimes not getting what you want is a wonderful stroke of luck.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Our character is what we do when we think no one is looking.
general.author: Jackson Browne

general.quote: Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.
general.author: Norman Vincent Peale

general.quote: I learned that courage was not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it. The brave man is not he who does not feel afraid, but he who conquers that fear.
general.author: Nelson Mandela

general.quote: The truth is, unless you let go, unless you forgive yourself, unless you forgive the situation, unless you realize that that situation is over, you cannot move forward.
general.author: Steve Maraboli

general.quote: How people treat you is their karma; how you react is yours.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Upon awakening, let the words Thank You flow from your lips, for this will remind you to begin your day with gratitude and compassion.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: The purpose of life is a life of purpose.
general.author: Robert Byrne

general.quote: If you believe it will work out , you'll see opportunities. If you believe it won't you will see obstacles.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Don't waste your time with explanations: people only hear what they want to hear.
general.author: Paulo Coelho

general.quote: Don't take anything personally. Nothing other people do is because of you. It is because of themselves
general.author: Don Miguel Ruiz

general.quote: Have patience. Wait until the mud settles and the water is clear. Remain unmoving until right action arises by itself.
general.author: Lao Tzu

general.quote: Do not listen to those who weep and complain, for their disease is contagious.
general.author: Og Mandino

general.quote: Being happy doesn't mean that everything is perfect. It means you've decided to look beyond the imperfections.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: The poor man is not he who is without a cent, but he who is without a dream.
general.author: Harry Kemp

general.quote: The things we touch have no permanence. My master would say: there is nothing we can hold onto in this world. Only by letting go can we truly possess what is real.
general.author: Crouching Tiger, hidden Dragon

general.quote: If you worry about what might be, and wonder what might have been, you will ignore what is.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: Nothing is permanent in this wicked world – not even our troubles.
general.author: Charlie Chaplin

general.quote: Presence is when you're no longer waiting for the next moment, believing that the next moment will be more fulfilling than this one.
general.author: Eckhart Tolle

general.quote: If you want to learn, teach. If you need inspiration, inspire others. If you're sad, cheer someone up.
general.author: Leo Babauta

general.quote: Walk away from anything or anyone who takes away from your joy. Life is too short to put up with fools.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: It is the power of the mind to be unconquerable.
general.author: Seneca

general.quote: Forget injuries, never forget kindnesses.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: He who will not economize will have to agonize.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: I hear and I forget. I see and I remember. I do and I understand.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: Ignorance is the night of the mind, but a night without moon and star.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go so long as you do not stop.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: Men's natures are alike, it is their habits that carry them far apart.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in getting up every time we do.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: Respect yourself and others will respect you.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: Study the past if you would define the future.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: The superior man, when resting in safety, does not forget that danger may come. When in a state of security he does not forget the possibility of ruin. When all is orderly, he does not forget that disorder may come. Thus his person is not endangered, and his States and all their clans are preserved.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: To be able under all circumstances to practice five things constitutes perfect virtue; these five things are gravity, generosity of soul, sincerity, earnestness and kindness.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: To see what is right and not to do it is want of courage.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: What the superior man seeks is in himself; what the small man seeks is in others.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: When anger rises, think of the consequences.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: When we see men of a contrary character, we should turn inwards and examine ourselves.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: Wheresoever you go, go with all your heart.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: They must often change who would be constant in happiness or wisdom.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: By nature, men are nearly alike; by practice, they get to be wide apart.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: Fine words and an insinuating appearance are seldom associated with true virtue.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: Have no friends not equal to yourself.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: He who exercises government by means of his virtue may be compared to the north polar star, which keeps its place and all the stars turn towards it.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: He who speaks without modesty will find it difficult to make his words good.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: He with whom neither slander that gradually soaks into the mind, nor statements that startle like a wound in the flesh, are successful may be called intelligent indeed.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: Hold faithfulness and sincerity as first principles.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: I am not one who was born in the possession of knowledge; I am one who is fond of antiquity, and earnest in seeking it there.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: I have not seen a person who loved virtue, or one who hated what was not virtuous. He who loved virtue would esteem nothing above it.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: If you think you are too small to make a difference, try sleeping with a mosquito.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Love is the absence of judgement.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: My religion is very simple. My religion is kindness.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote:
There is a saying in Tibetan, ‘Tragedy should be utilized as a source of strength.'
No matter what sort of difficulties, how painful experience is, if we lose our hope, that's our real disaster.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Remember that the best relationship is one in which your love for each other exceeds your need for each other.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Every day, think as you wake up, today I am fortunate to be alive, I have a precious human life, I am not going to waste it. I am going to use all my energies to develop myself, to expand my heart out to others; to achieve enlightenment for the benefit of all beings. I am going to have kind thoughts towards others, I am not going to get angry or think badly about others. I am going to benefit others as much as I can.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Silence is sometimes the best answer
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Know the rules well, so you can break them effectively.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Choose to be optimistic, it feels better.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Love and compassion are necessities, not luxuries. Without them, humanity cannot survive.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Our prime purpose in this life is to help others. And if you can't help them, at least don't hurt them.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: If a problem is fixable, if a situation is such that you can do something about it, then there is no need to worry. If it's not fixable, then there is no help in worrying. There is no benefit in worrying whatsoever.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: This is my simple religion. No need for temples. No need for complicated philosophy. Your own mind, your own heart is the temple. Your philosophy is simple kindness.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Judge your success by what you had to give up in order to get it.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Remember that sometimes not getting what you want is a wonderful stroke of luck.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: When we meet real tragedy in life, we can react in two ways–either by losing hope and falling into self-destructive habits, or by using the challenge to find our inner strength.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: People take different roads seeking fulfillment and happiness. Just because they're not on your road doesn't mean they've gotten lost.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: The whole purpose of religion is to facilitate love and compassion, patience, tolerance, humility, and forgiveness.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: If you can cultivate the right attitude, your enemies are your best spiritual teachers because their presence provides you with the opportunity to enhance and develop tolerance, patience and understanding.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: I believe compassion to be one of the few things we can practice that will bring immediate and long-term happiness to our lives. I'm not talking about the short-term gratification of pleasures like sex, drugs or gambling (though I'm not knocking them), but something that will bring true and lasting happiness. The kind that sticks.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Only the development of compassion and understanding for others can bring us the tranquility and happiness we all seek.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Take into account that great love and great achievements involve great risk.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: There is only one important point you must keep in your mind and let it be your guide. No matter what people call you, you are just who you are. Keep to this truth. You must ask yourself how is it you want to live your life. We live and we die, this is the truth that we can only face alone. No one can help us, not even the Buddha. So consider carefully, what prevents you from living the way you want to live your life?
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Look at children. Of course they may quarrel, but generally speaking they do not harbor ill feelings as much or as long as adults do. Most adults have the advantage of education over children, but what is the use of an education if they show a big smile while hiding negative feelings deep inside? Children don't usually act in such a manner. If they feel angry with someone, they express it, and then it is finished. They can still play with that person the following day.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: World peace must develop from inner peace. Peace is not just mere absence of violence. Peace is, I think, the manifestation of human compassion.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: All suffering is caused by ignorance. People inflict pain on others in the selfish pursuit of their own happiness or satisfaction.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: A truly compassionate attitude toward others does not change even if they behave negatively or hurt you.”
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote:
The more you are motivated by Love,
The more Fearless & Free your action will be.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: We can live without religion and meditation, but we cannot survive without human affection.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Old friends pass away, new friends appear. It is just like the days. An old day passes, a new day arrives. The important thing is to make it meaningful: a meaningful friend – or a meaningful day.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Hard times build determination and inner strength. Through them we can also come to appreciate the uselessness of anger. Instead of getting angry nurture a deep caring and respect for troublemakers because by creating such trying circumstances they provide us with invaluable opportunities to practice tolerance and patience.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: When you realize you've made a mistake, take immediate steps to correct it.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: A good friend who points out mistakes and imperfections and rebukes evil is to be respected as if he reveals the secret of some hidden treasure.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: The way to change others' minds is with affection, and not anger.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: If you have fear of some pain or suffering, you should examine whether there is anything you can do about it. If you can, there is no need to worry about it; if you cannot do anything, then there is also no need to worry.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Love and Compassion are the true religions to me. But to develop this, we do not need to believe in any religion.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: In the practice of tolerance, one's enemy is the best teacher.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Inner peace is the key: if you have inner peace, the external problems do not affect your deep sense of peace and tranquility…without this inner peace, no matter how comfortable your life is materially, you may still be worried, disturbed, or unhappy because of circumstances.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: The purpose of all the major religious traditions is not to construct big temples on the outside, but to create temples of goodness and compassion inside, in our hearts.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Compassion is the radicalism of our time.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Because we all share this planet earth, we have to learn to live in harmony and peace with each other and with nature. This is not just a dream, but a necessity.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: When we are motivated by compassion and wisdom, the results of our actions benefit everyone, not just our individual selves or some immediate convenience. When we are able to recognize and forgive ignorant actions of the past, we gain strength to constructively solve the problems of the present.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: It is under the greatest adversity that there exists the greatest potential for doing good, both for oneself and others.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Irrespective of whether we are believers or agnostics, whether we believe in God or karma, moral ethics is a code which everyone is able to pursue.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Peace does not mean an absence of conflicts; differences will always be there. Peace means solving these differences through peaceful means; through dialogue, education, knowledge; and through humane ways.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: I defeat my enemies when I make them my friends.

general.quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.

general.quote: Get busy living or get busy dying.

general.quote: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.

general.quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do.

general.quote: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.

You can be discouraged by failure or you can learn from it, so go ahead and make mistakes. Make all you can. Because remember that's where you will find success.

general.quote: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.

general.quote: Success is just a war of attrition. Sure, there's an element of talent you should probably possess. But if you just stick around long enough, eventually something is going to happen.

general.quote: The opposite of love is not hate; it's indifference.

general.quote: Life is ten percent what happens to you and ninety percent how you respond to it.

general.quote: I never knew how to worship until I knew how to love.

general.quote: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.

general.quote: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.
general.author: Harriet Tubman

general.quote: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.

general.quote: Live in the sunshine, swim the sea, drink the wild air.

general.quote: I only regret that I have but one life to give for my country.

general.quote: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.

general.quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.

general.quote: What you do speaks so loudly that I cannot hear what you say.

general.quote: Spread love everywhere you go: first of all in your own house. Give love to your children, to your wife or husband, to a next door neighbor. general.quote: Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life.

general.quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.

general.quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.

general.quote: Keep your face to the sunshine and you can never see the shadow.

general.quote: The best way out is always through.

general.quote: People are just as happy as they make up their minds to be.

general.quote: Courage is what it takes to stand up and speak. Courage is also what it takes to sit down and listen.

general.quote: Children are our most valuable resource.

general.quote: Music in the soul can be heard by the universe.

general.quote: Peace begins with a smile.

general.quote: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.

general.quote: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.

general.quote: Never leave that till tomorrow which you can do today.

general.quote: We must learn to live together as brothers or perish together as fools.

general.quote: The person who says it cannot be done should not interrupt the person who is doing it.
general.author: Chinese Proverb

general.quote: Literature is one of the most interesting and significant expressions of humanity.

general.quote: Your life is your canvas, and you are the masterpiece. There are a million ways to be kind, amazing, fabulous, creative, bold, and interesting.

general.quote: At every stage of my career I have had interesting and cordial colleagues, some of whom are close friends.

general.quote: Looking back is a way to sharpen the focus on the things you want to change in your life. I think there's something about nostalgia that really puts a fine point on the here-and-now, and that can be incredibly fascinating and interesting and engaging for the mind.

general.quote: Red is such an interesting color to correlate with emotion, because it's on both ends of the spectrum. On one end you have happiness, falling in love, infatuation with someone, passion, all that. On the other end, you've got obsession, jealousy, danger, fear, anger and frustration.

general.quote: I always find beauty in things that are odd and imperfect - they are much more interesting.

general.quote: One of my favorite movies of all time is 'It's A Wonderful Life,' which is a pretty interesting choice for a seasonal Christmas favorite, because it's about a guy who wants to commit suicide and is presented with reasons not to.

general.quote: The man who removes a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.

general.quote: I never said I wanted a 'happy' life but an interesting one. From separation and loss, I have learned a lot. We don't even know how strong we are until we are forced to bring that hidden strength forward.

general.quote: It's okay to lose. Losing teaches you something. Having to try and going through the trials and tribulations to actually overcome, to get there to win, to triumph, that's what makes life interesting.

general.quote: I don't say I create. I copy, of course. I've never been interested in the point of view of the tailor or creator. Fashion is a visual impression. general.quote: Do not mind anything that anyone tells you about anyone else. Judge everyone and everything for yourself.

general.quote: There is no charm equal to tenderness of heart.

general.quote: Lord, make me an instrument of thy peace. Where there is hatred, let me sow love.

general.quote: The only journey is the one within.

general.quote: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.

general.quote: Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.
general.author: Margaret Mead

general.quote: We must make the best of those ills which cannot be avoided.

general.quote: Find a place inside where there's joy, and the joy will burn out the pain.

life.quote: You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated.

life.quote: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.

life.quote: In this life we cannot do great things. We can only do small things with great love.

life.quote: Only a life lived for others is a life worthwhile.

life.quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams! Live the life you've imagined.
life.author: Henry David Thoreau

success.quote: Success is not final; failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
success.author: Winston S. Churchill

success.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
success.author: Henry David Thoreau

success.quote: If you really look closely, most overnight successes took a long time.

success.quote: The secret of success is to do the common thing uncommonly well.

success.quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.

success.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.

success.quote: Successful people do what unsuccessful people are not willing to do. Don't wish it were easier; wish you were better.

success.author: David Brinkley

success.quote: Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value.

success.quote: Always bear in mind that your own resolution to success is more important than any other one thing.

motivational.author: Alan Kay
motivational.quote: Don't worry about what anybody else is going to do. The best way to predict the future is to invent it.

motivational.author: Donald Knuth
motivational.quote: Premature optimization is the root of all evil (or at least most of it) in programming.

motivational.author: Edsger Dijkstra, CACM, 15:10
motivational.quote: Lisp has jokingly been called "the most intelligent way to misuse a computer". I think that description is a great compliment because it transmits the full flavor of liberation: it has assisted a number of our most gifted fellow humans in thinking previously impossible thoughts.

motivational.author: Mark Twain
motivational.quote: Keep away from people who try to belittle your ambitions. Small people always do that, but the really great make you feel that you, too, can become great.

motivational.author: Jeff "hemos" Bates, Director, OSDN; Co-evolver, Slashdot
motivational.quote: What Paul does, and does very well, is to take ideas and concepts that are beautiful in the abstract, and brings them down to a real world level. That's a rare talent to find in writing these days.

motivational.author: Yukihiro "Matz" Matsumoto, creator of Ruby
motivational.quote: Since programmers create programs out of nothing, imagination is our only limitation. Thus, in the world of programming, the hero is the one who has great vision. Paul Graham is one of our contemporary heroes. He has the ability to embrace the vision, and to express it plainly. His works are my favorites, especially the ones describing language design. He explains secrets of programming, languages, and human nature that can only be learned from the hacker experience. This book shows you his great vision, and tells you the truth about the nature of hacking.

motivational.author: Modern zen Poem
motivational.quote: To follow the path: look to the master, follow the master, walk with the master, see through the master, become the master.

motivational.author: Eric S. Raymond, How to become a hacker
motivational.quote: No problem should ever have to be solved twice.

motivational.author: Eric S. Raymond, How to become a hacker
motivational.quote: Attitude is no substitute for competence.

motivational.author: Juan Meng, Reviewing "The future of ideas" by Lawrence Lessig
motivational.quote: It is said that the real winner is the one who lives in today but able to see tomorrow.

motivational.author: Alan J. Perlis (Epigrams in programming)
motivational.quote: Fools ignore complexity. Pragmatists suffer it. Some can avoid it. Geniuses remove it.

motivational.author: Alan J. Perlis (Epigrams in programming)
motivational.quote: A year spent in artificial intelligence is enough to make one believe in God.

motivational.author: Alan J. Perlis (Epigrams in programmi ng)
motivational.quote: Dealing with failure is easy: Work hard to improve. Success is also easy to handle: You've solved the wrong problem. Work hard to improve.

motivational.author: Alan J. Perlis (Epigrams in programming)
motivational.quote: Within a computer natural language is unnatural.

motivational.author: Alan J. Perlis (Epigrams in programming)
motivational.quote: You think you know when you learn, are more sure when you can write, even more when you can teach, but certain when you can program.

motivational.author: Alan J. Perlis (Epigrams in programming)
motivational.quote: Adapting old programs to fit new machines usually means adapting new machines to behave like old ones.

motivational.author: Alexander Pope
motivational.quote: A little learning is a dangerous thing.

motivational.author: Eric Raymond
motivational.quote: Computer science education cannot make anybody an expert programmer any more than studying brushes and pigment can make somebody an expert painter.

motivational.author: Frederick P. Brooks, No Sliver Bullet.
motivational.quote: Einstein argued that there must be simplified explanations of nature, because God is not capricious or arbitrary.

motivational.author: Roger Schank, Engines for Education
motivational.quote: Students should be evaluated on how well they can achieve the goals they strived to achieve within a realistic context. Students need to learn to do things, not know things.

motivational.author: Roger Schank, Engines for Education
motivational.quote: We remember what we learn when we care about performing better and when we believe that what we have been asked to do is representative of reality.

motivational.author: Roger Schank, Engines for Education
motivational.quote: There really is no learning without doing.

motivational.author: Roger Schank, Engines for Education
motivational.quote: We really have to get over the idea that some stuff is just worth knowing even if you never do anything with it. Human memories happily erase stuff that has no purpose, so why try to fill up children's heads with such stuff?

motivational.author: E. W. Dijkstra, The humble programmer
motivational.quote: The only problems we can really solve in a satisfactory manner are those that finally admit a nicely factored solution.

motivational.author: E. W. Dijkstra, The humble programmer
motivational.quote: The best way to learn to live with our limitations is to know them.

motivational.author: E. W. Dijkstra, The humble programmer
motivational.quote: This challenge, viz. the confrontation with the programming task, is so unique that this novel experience can teach us a lot about ourselves. It should deepen our understanding of the processes of design and creation, it should give us better control over the task of organizing our thoughts. If it did not do so, to my taste we should no deserve the computer at all!  It has allready taught us a few lessons, and the one I have chosen to stress in this talk is the following. We shall do a much better programming job, provided that we approach the task with a full appreciation of its tremenduous difficulty, provided that we stick to modest and elegant programming languages, provided that we respect the intrinsec limitations of the human mind and approach the task as Very Humble Programmers.

motivational.author: Hermann Weyl, The Mathematical Way of Thinking
motivational.quote: We now come to the decisive step of mathematical abstraction: we forget about what the symbols stand for. ...[The mathematician] need not be idle; there are many operations which he may carry out with these symbols, without ever having to look at the things they stand for.

motivational.author: Eric Lippert.
motivational.quote: An expert is, according to my working definition "someone who doesn't need to look up answers to easy questions".

motivational.author: Alan J. Perlis
motivational.quote: The programmer must seek both perfection of part and adequacy of collection.

motivational.author: Alan J. Perlis
motivational.quote: Thus, programs must be written for people to read, and only incidentally for machines to execute.

motivational.author: Alan J. Perlis
motivational.quote: We control complexity by building abstractions that hide details when appropriate. We control complexity by establishing conventional interfaces that enable us to construct systems by combining standard, well-understood pieces in a ``mix and match'' way. We control complexity by establishing new languages for describing a design, each of which emphasizes particular aspects of the design and deemphasizes others.

motivational.author: John Locke, An Essay Concerning Human Understanding (1690)
motivational.quote: The acts of the mind, wherein it exerts its power over simple ideas, are chiefly these three: 1. Combining several simple ideas into one compound one, and thus all complex ideas are made. 2. The second is bringing two ideas, whether simple or complex, together, and setting them by one another so as to take a view of them at once, without uniting them into one, by which it gets all its ideas of relations. 3. The third is separating them from all other ideas that accompany them in their real existence: this is called abstraction, and thus all its general ideas are made.

motivational.author: Alan J. Perlis
motivational.quote: Lisp programmers know the value of everything but the cost of nothing.

motivational.author: SICP
motivational.quote: An interpreter raises the machine to the level of the user program; a compiler lowers the user program to the level of the machine language.

motivational.author: Albert Einstein
motivational.quote: Everything should be made as simple as possible, but no simpler.

motivational.author: WestHost weekly newsletter 14 Feb 2003
motivational.quote: The great dividing line between success and failure can be expressed in five words: "I did not have time."

motivational.author: Napoleon Bonaparte (allegedly)
motivational.quote: When your enemy is making a very serious mistake, don't be impolite and disturb him.

motivational.author: Hugh Kingsmill
motivational.quote: A charlatan makes obscure what is clear; a thinker makes clear what is obscure.

motivational.author: C. A. R. Hoare
motivational.quote: There are two ways of constructing a software design; one way is to make it so simple that there are obviously no deficiencies, and the other way is to make it so complicated that there are no obvious deficiencies. The first method is far more difficult.

motivational.author: Joel Spolsky
motivational.quote: And if you go too far up, abstraction-wise, you run out of oxygen. Sometimes smart thinkers just don't know when to stop, and they create these absurd, all-encompassing, high-level pictures of the universe that are all good and fine, but don't actually mean anything at all.

motivational.author: Larry Wall (Programming Perl)
motivational.quote: The three chief virtues of a programmer are: Laziness, Impatience and Hubris.

motivational.author: Joel Spolsky (The Law of Leaky Abstractions)
motivational.quote: All non-trivial abstractions, to some degree, are leaky.

motivational.author: Guido van Rossum
motivational.quote: XML wasn't designed to be edited by humans on a regular basis.

motivational.author: Keith Devens
motivational.quote: Premature abstraction is an equally grevious sin as premature optimization.

motivational.author: Bjarne Stroustrup
motivational.quote: You can have premature generalization as well as premature optimization.

motivational.author: Matthew 5:45
motivational.quote: He causes his sun to rise on the evil and the good, and sends rain on the righteous and the unrighteous.

motivational.author: Alan Perlis
motivational.quote: A language that doesn't affect the way you think about programming, is not worth knowing.

motivational.author: Blaise Pascal (attributed)
motivational.quote: Men never do evil so completely and cheerfully as when they do it from religious conviction.

motivational.author: unknown
motivational.quote: Everybody makes their own fun. If you don't make it yourself, it ain't fun; it's entertainment.

motivational.author: Edsger Dijkstra
motivational.quote: If we wish to count lines of code, we should not regard them as *lines produced* but as *lines spent*.

motivational.author: Steven Den Beste
motivational.quote: Sometimes a man with too broad a perspective reveals himself as having no real perspective at all. A man who tries too hard to see every side may be a man who is trying to avoid choosing any side. A man who tries too hard to seek a deeper truth may be trying to hide from the truth he already knows.  That is not a sign of intellectual sophistication and "great thinking". It is a demonstration of moral degeneracy and cowardice.

motivational.author: William Strunk, Jr. (The Elements of Style)
motivational.quote: Omit needless words.

motivational.author: Galileo Galilei
motivational.quote: I have never met a man so ignorant that I couldn't learn something from him.

motivational.author: Brave New World (paraphrased)
motivational.quote: Philosophy: the finding of bad reasons for what one believes by instinct.

motivational.author: C.S. Lewis
motivational.quote: Of all tyrannies a tyranny sincerely exercised for the good of its victims may be the most oppressive. It may be better to live under robber barons than under omnipotent moral busybodies, The robber baron's cruelty may sometimes sleep, his cupidity may at some point be satiated; but those who torment us for own good will torment us without end, for they do so with the approval of their own conscience.

motivational.author: Catwoman (The Batman TV Series, episode 83)
motivational.quote: Fools! Don't they know that tears are a woman's most effective weapon?

motivational.author:
some chick in Alien vs. Predator, when asked why she
always carries a gun
motivational.quote: It's like a condom; I'd rather have it and not need it than need it and not have it.

motivational.author: Scott McKay
motivational.quote: C++ is history repeated as tragedy. Java is history repeated as farce.

motivational.author: unknown
motivational.quote: Simplicity takes effort. Genius, even.

motivational.author: unknown
motivational.quote: Show, don't tell.

motivational.author: David (Psalm 56:4)
motivational.quote: In God I trust; I will not be afraid. What can mortal man do to me?

motivational.author: Jamie Zawinski
motivational.quote: Linux is only free if your time has no value.

motivational.author: wordpress.org
motivational.quote: Code is poetry.

motivational.author: Rush (Freewill)
motivational.quote: If you choose not to decide, you still have made a choice.

motivational.author: Alfred North Whitehead (Introduction to Mathematics)
motivational.quote: Civilization advances by extending the number of important operations which we can perform without thinking about them.

motivational.author: Cicero
motivational.quote: The function of wisdom is to discriminate between good and evil.

motivational.author: Brad Bird, writer and director, The Incredibles
motivational.quote: The reason to do animation is caricature. Good caricature picks out the essense of the statement and removes everything else. It's not simply about reproducing reality; It's about bumping it up.

motivational.author: Ronald Reagan
motivational.quote: Mistakes were made.

motivational.author: "Hoots"
motivational.quote: I would rather be an optimist and be wrong than a pessimist who proves to be right. The former sometimes wins, but never the latter.

motivational.author: Pontius Pilate
motivational.quote: What is truth?

motivational.author: Ferris Bueller
motivational.quote: Life moves pretty fast. If you don't stop and look around once in a while, you could miss it.

motivational.author: Eric S. Raymond
motivational.quote: Lisp is worth learning for the profound enlightenment experience you will have when you finally get it; that experience will make you a better programmer for the rest of your days, even if you never actually use Lisp itself a lot.

motivational.author: Philip Greenspun (Greenspun's Tenth Rule)
motivational.quote: Any sufficiently complicated C or Fortran program contains an ad hoc, informally specified, bug-ridden, slow implementation of half of Common Lisp.

motivational.author: Paul Graham
motivational.quote: I was talking recently to a friend who teaches at MIT. His field is hot now and every year he is inundated by applications from would-be graduate students. "A lot of them seem smart," he said. "What I can't tell is whether they have any kind of taste."

motivational.author: Donald Campbell
motivational.quote: The direct pursuit of happiness is a recipe for an unhappy life.

motivational.author: Randy S. Nelson (dean of Pixar University)
motivational.quote: It's no trick for talented people to be interesting, but it's a gift to be interested. We want an organization filled with interested people.

motivational.author: Randy S. Nelson (dean of Pixar University)
motivational.quote: Why teach drawing to accountants? Because drawing class doesn't just teach people to draw. It teaches them to be more observant. There's no company on earth that wouldn't benefit from having people become more observant.

motivational.author: Butler Lampson
motivational.quote: All problems in computer science can be solved by another level of indirection.

motivational.author: Antoine de St Exupery
motivational.quote: A designer knows he has arrived at perfection not when there is no longuer anything to add, but when there is no longuer anything to take away.

motivational.author: Aristotle
motivational.quote: For the things we have to learn before we can do them, we learn by doing them.

motivational.author: Hara Estroff Marano
motivational.quote: There are many ways to avoid success in life, but the most sure-fire just might be procrastination.

motivational.author: [fact]
motivational.quote: PI seconds is a nanocentury.

motivational.author: [fact]
motivational.quote: A non negative binary integer value x is a power of 2 iff (x & (x-1)) is 0 using 2's complement arithmetic.

motivational.author: [A comment on a blog]
motivational.quote: While I’ve always appreciated beautiful code, I share Jonathan’s concern about studying it too much. I think studying beauty in music and painting has led us to modern classical music and painting that the majority of us just don’t get. Beauty can be seen when it emerges, but isn’t something to strive for in isolation of a larger context. In the software world, the larger context would be the utility of the software to the end user.

motivational.author: unknown
motivational.quote: Dont give users the opportunity to lock themselves.

motivational.author: unknown
motivational.quote: Any fool can make the simple complex, only a smart person can make the complex simple.

motivational.author: Paul Graham.
motivational.quote: To do something well you have to love it. So to the extent you can preserve hacking as something you love, you're likely to do it well. Try to keep the sense of wonder you had about programming at age 14. If you're worried that your current job is rotting your brain, it probably is.

motivational.author: [Ideas for flamewars]
motivational.quote: - If you give him a penny for his thoughts, you'd get change. - Not the sharpest knife in the drawer. - A prime candidate for natural deselection.

motivational.author: Paul Graham
motivational.quote: What I didn't understand was that the value of some new acquisition wasn't the difference between its retail price and what I paid for it. It was the value I derived from it. Stuff is an extremely illiquid asset. Unless you have some plan for selling that valuable thing you got so cheaply, what difference does it make what it's "worth?" The only way you're ever going to extract any value from it is to use it. And if you don't have any immediate use for it, you probably never will.

motivational.author: unknown
motivational.quote: Only bad designers blame their failings on the users.

motivational.author: unknown
motivational.quote: Humans aren't rational. They rationalize. And I don't just mean "some of them" or "other people". I'm talking about everyone. We have a "logic engine" in our brains, but for the most part, it's not the one in the driver's seat.

motivational.author: The culture code.
motivational.quote: What do Americans look for in a car? I've heard many answers when I've asked this question. The answers include excellent safety ratings, great gas mileage, handling, and cornering ability, among others. I don't believe any of these. That's because the first principle of the Culture Code is that the only effective way to understand what people truly mean is to ignore what they say. This is not to suggest that people intentionally lie or misrepresent themselves. What it means is that, when asked direct questions about their interests and preferences, people tend to give answers they believe the questioner wants to hear. Again, this is not because they intend to mislead. It is because people respond to these questions with their cortexes, the parts of their brains that control intelligence rather than emotion or instinct. They ponder a question, they process a question, and when they deliver an answer, it is the product of deliberation. They believe they are telling the truth. A lie detector would confirm this. In most cases, however, they aren't saying what they mean.

motivational.author: unknown
motivational.quote: When all you have is a hammer, everything looks like a nail.

motivational.author: http://www.catonmat.net
motivational.quote: Good coders code, great reuse.

motivational.author: Tim Harford
motivational.quote: The lesson of the story might appear to be that self-interested and ambitious people in power are often the cause of wastefulness in developing countries. But self-interested and ambitious people are in positions of power, great and small, all over the world. In many places, they are restrained by the law, the press, and democratic opposition. Cameroon's tragedy is that there is nothing to hold self-interest in check.

motivational.author: http://secretsofstudying.com/
motivational.quote: To solve your problems you must learn new skills, adapt new thought patterns, and become a different person than you were before that problem.  God has crafted you for success. In the middle of every adversity lie your best opportunities. Discover it, build upon it and move forward in your journey to live an extraordinary life.  You owe it to yourself to live a great life. Don’t let negative thoughts pull you down. Be grateful and open to learn and grow.

motivational.author: unknown
motivational.quote: If there is a will, there is a way.

motivational.author: [Fixing architecture flaws in Rails' ORM]
motivational.quote: Having large case statements in an object-oriented language is a sure sign your design is flawed.

motivational.author: Sincerity Theory
motivational.quote: Being a programmer is the same way. The only way to be a good programmer is to write code. When you realize you haven't been writing much code lately, and it seems like all you do is brag about code you wrote in the past, and people start looking at you funny while you're shooting your mouth off, realize it's because they know. They might not even know they know, but they know. So, yes, doing what you love brings success, and by all means, throw yourself a nice big party, buy yourself a nice car, soak up the adulation of an adoring crowd. Then shut the fuck up and get back to work.

motivational.author: The bipolar lisp programmer
motivational.quote: Another feature about this guy is his low threshold of boredom. He'll pick up on a task and work frantically at it, accomplishing wonders in a short time and then get bored and drop it before its properly finished. He'll do nothing but strum his guitar and lie around in bed for several days after.  Thats also part of the pattern too; periods of frenetic activity followed by periods of melancholia, withdrawal and inactivity. This is a bipolar personality.

motivational.author: David Heinemeier Hansson (Ruby On Rails' creator)
motivational.quote: My dream is that people adopt it on its own merits. We're not trying to bend Ruby on Rails to fit the enterprise, we're encouraging enterprises to bend to Ruby on Rails. Come if you like it, stay away if you don't. We're not going head over heels to accommodate the enterprise or to lure them away from Java. That's how you end up with Java, if you start bending to special interest groups.

motivational.author: William S. Annis
motivational.quote: New eyes have X-ray vision.  [someone that hasn't written it is more likely to spot the bug. "someone" can be you after a break]

motivational.author: Mark Chu-Carroll
motivational.quote: So - what are the most important problems in software engineering? I’d answer “dealing with complexity”.

motivational.author: Paul Graham (a talk at Y Combinator, for startup creators).
motivational.quote: So the mere constraint of staying in regular contact with us will push you to make things happen, because otherwise you'll be embarrassed to tell us that you haven't done anything new since the last time we talked.

motivational.author: Andreas Zwinkau
motivational.quote: The choice of the university is mostly important for the piece of paper you get at the end. The education you get depends on you.

motivational.author: Alexandru Vancea
motivational.quote: Remember that you are humans in the first place and only after that programmers.

motivational.author: SlideTrombone (comment on "Programming can ruin your life")
motivational.quote: Humans differ from animals to the degree that they are not merely an end result of their conditioning, but are able to reflect on their experiences and strategies, and apply insight to make changes in the way they live to modify the outcome.

motivational.author: Isaac (blog comment)
motivational.quote: As builders and creators finding the perfect solution should not be our main goal. We should find the perfect problem.

motivational.author: Super-sizing YouTube with Python (Mike Solomon, mike@youtube.com)
motivational.quote: Just like carpentry, measure twice cut once.

motivational.author: Douglas Crockford (Author of JSON and JsLint)
motivational.quote: The good thing about reinventing the wheel is that you get a round one.

motivational.author: Corneluis (comment on 'Are you going to change the world? (Really?)')

motivational.author: Bruce Wilder (blog post comment)
motivational.quote: Abstraction is a form of data compression: absolutely necessary, because human short-term memory is so small, but the critically important aspect of abstraction is the algorithm that gets you from the name back to the "uncompressed" details.

motivational.author: Paul Graham, The other road ahead.
motivational.quote: Have you ever noticed that when you sit down to write something, half the ideas that end up in it are ones you thought of while writing it? The same thing happens with software. Working to implement one idea gives you more ideas.

motivational.author: SICP, What is meant by data?
motivational.quote: In general, we can think of data as defined by some collection of selectors and constructors, together with specified conditions that these procedures must fulfill in order to be a valid representation.

motivational.author: Steve Yegge.
motivational.quote: Resume writing is just like dating, or applying for a bank loan, in that nobody wants you if you're desperate.

motivational.author: Joesgoals.com
motivational.quote: Mastering isn’t a survival instinct; it’s an urge to excel. Mastering is one of the experiences that delineates us from animals. It is striving to be more tomorrow than we are today; to perfectly pitch the ball over home plate; to craft the perfect sentence in an article; to open the oven and feel the warm, richly-scented cloud telling you dinner is going to be absolutely extraordinary. We humans crave perfection, to be masters of our domain, to distinguish ourselves by sheer skill and prowess.

motivational.author: Joesgoals.com
motivational.quote: It(mastering)’s knowing what you are doing.

motivational.author: Stevey, Refactoring Trilogy, Part 1.
motivational.quote: Well then. How could you possibly live without automated refactoring tools? How else could you coordinate the caterpillar-like motions of all Java’s identical tiny legs, its thousands of similar parts? I’ll tell you how: Ruby is a butterfly.

motivational.author: Marc (http://kickin-the-darkness.blogspot.com/)
motivational.quote: You will never become a Great Programmer until you acknowledge that you will always be a Terrible Programmer. You will remain a Great Programmer for only as long as you acknowledge that you are still a Terrible Programmer.

motivational.author: Bruce Lee
motivational.quote: If I tell you I'm good, you would probably think I'm boasting. If I tell you I'm no good, you know I'm lying.

motivational.author: VladimirSlepnev
motivational.quote: Let me try to get this straight: Lisp is a language for describing algorithms. This was JohnMcCarthy's original purpose, anyway: to build something more convenient than a Turing machine. Lisp is not about file, socket or GUI programming - Lisp is about expressive power. (For example, you can design multiple object systems for Lisp, in Lisp. Or implement the now-fashionable AOP. Or do arbitrary transformations on parsed source code.) If you don't value expressive power, Lisp ain't for you. I, personally, would prefer Lisp to not become mainstream: this would necessarily involve a dumbing down.

motivational.author: David Gorman (ImThere.com)
motivational.quote: If something isn’t working, you need to look back and figure out what got you excited in the first place.

motivational.author: Marc Andreessen (http://blog.pmarca.com/)
motivational.quote: Pay attention to opportunity cost at all times. Doing one thing means not doing other things. This is a form of risk that is very easy to ignore, to your detriment.

motivational.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb, "The Black Swan".
motivational.quote: Seize any opportunity, or anything that looks like opportunity. They are rare, much rarer than you think...

motivational.author: Dan Nugent
motivational.quote: I think that a lot of programmers are ignoring an important point when people talk about reducing code repetition on large projects. Part of the idea is that large projects are intrinsically *wrong*. That you should be looking at making a number of smaller projects that are composable, even if you never end up reusing one of those smaller projects elsewhere.

motivational.author: Jared Diamond
motivational.quote: We tend to seek easy, single-factor explanations of success. For most important things, though, success actually requires avoiding many separate causes of failure.

motivational.author: Johann Wolfgang Von Goethe (1749-1832)
motivational.quote: Things which matter most must never be at the mercy of things which matter least.

motivational.author: Paul Graham, on the Lightweight Languages mailing list.
motivational.quote: I think the root of your mistake is saying that macros don't scale to larger groups. The real truth is that macros don't scale to stupider groups.

motivational.author: Paul Graham and Norbert Weiner, respectively
motivational.quote: Argue with idiots, and you become an idiot. If you compete with slaves you become a slave.

motivational.author: Chris Crawford
motivational.quote: Always dive down into a problem and get your hands on the deepest issue behind the problem. All other considerations are to dismissed as "engineering details"; they can be sorted out after the basic problem has been solved.

motivational.author: Alan Perlis
motivational.quote: Don't have good ideas if you aren't willing to be responsible for them.

motivational.author: Edsger Dijkstra
motivational.quote: It is impossible to sharpen a pencil with a blunt axe. It is equally vain to try to do it with ten blunt axes instead.

motivational.author: Edsger Dijkstra
motivational.quote: If we wish to count lines of code, we should not regard them as lines produced but as lines spent.

motivational.author: Rear Admiral Grace Hopper
motivational.quote: The most damaging phrase in the language is, It's always been done that way.

motivational.author: Reginald Braithwaite

Melt the CVS repository and microwave the backup CDs. When things go wrong, I've often tried to play the hero from start to finish. Guess what? Some projects are doomed no matter what. Some need skills I don't possess. And some need a fresh face.

motivational.author: DJ MacLean
motivational.quote: The only thing a man should ever be 100% convinced of is his own ignorance.

motivational.author: Bob Sutton

The quest for management magic and breakthrough ideas is overrated; being a master of the obvious is underrated. Jim Maloney is right: Work is an overrated activity

motivational.author: Albert Einstein

motivational.author: Erik Naggum
motivational.quote: Act from reason, and failure makes you rethink and study harder. Act from faith, and failure makes you blame someone and push harder.

motivational.author: Max Levchin, PayPal founder, Talk at StartupSchool2007

motivational.author: Hadi Partovi & Ali Partovi (iLike.com), Talk at StartupSchool2007

motivational.author: Mark Ward

motivational.author: http://www.cpax.org.uk/prg/
motivational.quote: Write it properly first. It's easier to make a correct program fast, than to make a fast program correct.

motivational.author: BetterExplained.com
motivational.quote: You can’t get to version 500 if you don’t start with a version 1.

motivational.author: BetterExplained.com

motivational.author: Sherlock Holmes

motivational.author: George Miller

motivational.author: Lao­Tzu

motivational.author: Ben Hoyts (micropledge)

motivational.author: Paolo Bonzini
motivational.quote: There is one meaning [for static in C]: a global variable that is invisible outside the current scope, be it a function or a file.

motivational.author: LeCamarade (freeshells.ch)

motivational.author: Bjarne Stroustrap
motivational.quote: Understanding why C++ is the way it is helps a programmer use it well. A deep understanding of a tool is essential for an expert craftsman.

motivational.author: Alberti
motivational.quote: No art, however minor, demands less than total dedication if you want to excel in it.

motivational.author: engtech (internetducttape.com)

motivational.author: OO Sucks (bluetail.com)

motivational.author: WikiHow
motivational.quote: It is better to be quiet and thought a fool than to open your mouth and remove all doubt.

motivational.author: ASPN : Python Cookbook : Explicit Tail Call

motivational.author: Steve Jobs
