motivational.quote: The trick is in what one emphasizes. We either make ourselves miserable, or we make ourselves happy. The amount of work is the same.
motivational.author: Carlos Castaneda

motivational.quote: Just as a flower, which seems beautiful has color but no perfume, so are the fruitless words of a man who speaks them but does them not.
motivational.author: Dhammapada

motivational.quote: Things that were hard to bear are sweet to remember.
motivational.author: Seneca

motivational.quote: Three things in human life are important. The first is to be kind. The second is to be kind. The third is to be kind.
motivational.author: Henry James

motivational.quote: However many holy words you read, However many you speak, What good will they do you If you do not act on upon them?
motivational.author: Buddha

motivational.quote: They can conquer who believe they can.
motivational.author: Virgil

motivational.quote: Learn to listen. Opportunity could be knocking at your door very softly.
motivational.author: Frank Tyger

motivational.quote: All action results from thought, so it is thoughts that matter.
motivational.author: Sai Baba

motivational.quote: There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.
motivational.author: Albert Einstein

motivational.quote: I love my past. I love my present. I'm not ashamed of what Ive had, and I'm not sad because I have it no longer.
motivational.author: Colette

motivational.quote: Prejudice is a burden that confuses the past, threatens the future and renders the present inaccessible.
motivational.author: Maya Angelou

motivational.quote: Just as much as we see in others we have in ourselves.
motivational.author: William Hazlitt

motivational.quote: Prosperity depends more on wanting what you have than having what you want.
motivational.author: Geoffrey F. Abert

motivational.quote: How many cares one loses when one decides not to be something but to be someone.
motivational.author: Coco Chanel

motivational.quote: He who knows, does not speak. He who speaks, does not know.
motivational.author: Lao Tzu

motivational.quote: We cannot direct the wind but we can adjust the sails.
One may say the eternal mystery of the world is its comprehensibility.
motivational.author: Albert Einstein

motivational.quote: The self is not something ready-made, but something in continuous formation through choice of action.
motivational.author: John Dewey

motivational.quote: Our greatness lies not so much in being able to remake the world as being able to remake ourselves.
motivational.author: Mahatma Gandhi

motivational.quote: Moments of complete apathy are the best for new creations.
motivational.author: Philip Breedveld

motivational.quote: The only real mistake is the one from which we learn nothing.
motivational.author: John Powell

motivational.quote: To dream of the person you would like to be is to waste the person you are.
motivational.author: Tim Menchen

motivational.quote: The important thing is this: to be able at any moment to sacrifice what we are for what we could become.
motivational.author: Charles Dubois

motivational.quote: Gratitude is not only the greatest of virtues, but the paren't of all the others.
motivational.author: Cicero

motivational.quote: It is never too late. Even if you are going to die tomorrow, keep yourself straight and clear and be a happy human being today.
motivational.author: Lama Yeshe

motivational.quote: Respect is not something that you can ask for, buy or borrow. Respect is what you earn from each person no matter their background or status.
motivational.author: Byron Pulsifer

motivational.quote: Things do not change; we change.
motivational.author: Henry Thoreau

motivational.quote: We must learn our limits. We are all something, but none of us are everything.
motivational.author: Blaise Pascal

motivational.quote: Learn wisdom from the ways of a seedling. A seedling which is never hardened off through stressful situations will never become a strong productive plant.
motivational.author: Stephen Sigmund

motivational.quote: We are all faced with a series of great opportunities brilliantly disguised as impossible situations.
motivational.author: Charles R. Swindoll

motivational.quote: All men have a sweetness in their life. That is what helps them go on. It is towards that they turn when they feel too worn out.
motivational.author: Albert Camus

motivational.quote: Be a good listener. Your ears will never get you in trouble.
motivational.author: Frank Tyger

motivational.quote: Meditation brings wisdom; lack of mediation leaves ignorance. Know well what leads you forward and what hold you back, and choose the path that leads to wisdom.
motivational.author: Buddha

motivational.quote: You learn to speak by speaking, to study by studying, to run by running, to work by working; in just the same way, you learn to love by loving.
motivational.author: Anatole France

motivational.quote: To listen well is as powerful a means of communication and influence as to talk well.
motivational.author: John Marshall

motivational.quote: There is only one happiness in life, to love and be loved.
motivational.author: George Sand

motivational.quote: Live through feeling and you will live through love. For feeling is the language of the soul, and feeling is truth.
motivational.author: Matt Zotti

motivational.quote: Kindness in words creates confidence. Kindness in thinking creates profoundness. Kindness in giving creates love.
motivational.author: Lao Tzu

motivational.quote: Reason and free inquiry are the only effectual agents against error.
motivational.author: Thomas Jefferson

motivational.quote: The best cure for the body is a quiet mind.
motivational.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

motivational.quote: See the positive side, the potential, and make an effort.
motivational.author: Dalai Lama

motivational.quote: By accepting yourself and being fully what you are, your presence can make others happy.
motivational.author: Jane Roberts

motivational.quote: Never deny a diagnosis, but do deny the negative verdict that may go with it.
motivational.author: Norman Cousins

motivational.quote: The really unhappy person is the one who leaves undone what they can do, and starts doing what they don't understand; no wonder they come to grief.
motivational.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

motivational.quote: You cannot be lonely if you like the person you're alone with.
motivational.author: Wayne Dyer

motivational.quote: I do not believe in a fate that falls on men however they act; but I do believe in a fate that falls on man unless they act.
motivational.author: G. K. Chesterton

motivational.quote: If you propose to speak, always ask yourself, is it true, is it necessary, is it kind.
motivational.author: Buddha

motivational.quote: Risk more than others think is safe. Care more than others think is wise. Dream more than others think is practical.Expect more than others think is possible.
motivational.author: Cadet Maxim

motivational.quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
motivational.author: Og Mandino

motivational.quote: Let go of your attachment to being right, and suddenly your mind is more open. You're able to benefit from the unique viewpoints of others, without being crippled by your own judgement.
motivational.author: Ralph Marston

motivational.quote: Wrinkles should merely indicate where smiles have been.
motivational.author: Mark Twain

motivational.quote: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.
motivational.author: Zig Ziglar

motivational.quote: Let yourself be silently drawn by the stronger pull of what you really love.
motivational.author: Rumi

motivational.quote: I gave my life to become the person I am right now. Was it worth it?
motivational.author: Richard Bach

motivational.quote: Give thanks for a little and you will find a lot.
motivational.author: Hausa

motivational.quote: Your ability to learn faster than your competition is your only sustainable competitive advantage.
motivational.author: Arie de Gues

motivational.quote: Forgiveness does not change the past, but it does enlarge the future.
motivational.author: Paul Boese

motivational.quote: Let the future tell the truth, and evaluate each one according to his work and accomplishments. The present is theirs; the future, for which I have really worked, is mine.
motivational.author: Nikola Tesla

motivational.quote: Moral excellence comes about as a result of habit. We become just by doing just acts, temperate by doing temperate acts, brave by doing brave acts.
motivational.author: Aristotle

motivational.quote: The deepest craving of human nature is the need to be appreciated.
motivational.author: William James

motivational.quote: Love does not consist of gazing at each other, but in looking together in the same direction.
motivational.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

motivational.quote: We have committed the Golden Rule to memory; let us now commit it to life.
motivational.author: Edwin Markham

motivational.quote: It is with words as with sunbeams. The more they are condensed, the deeper they burn.
motivational.author: Robert Southey

motivational.quote: When people are like each other they tend to like each other.
motivational.author: Tony Robbins

motivational.quote: Sincerity is the way of Heaven. The attainment of sincerity is the way of men.
motivational.author: Confucius

motivational.quote: Be the change that you want to see in the world.
motivational.author: Mohandas Gandhi

motivational.quote: The more you care, the stronger you can be.
motivational.author: Jim Rohn

motivational.quote: Lots of people want to ride with you in the limo, but what you want is someone who will take the bus with you when the limo breaks down.
motivational.author: Oprah Winfrey

motivational.quote: Just trust yourself, then you will know how to live.
motivational.author: Goethe

motivational.quote: To be fully alive, fully human, and completely awake is to be continually thrown out of the nest.
motivational.author: Pema Chodron

motivational.quote: If you don't design your own life plan, chances are you'll fall into someone else's plan. And guess what they have planned for you? Not much.
motivational.author: Jim Rohn

motivational.quote: It all depends on how we look at things, and not how they are in themselves.
motivational.author: Carl Jung

motivational.quote: Giving up doesn't always mean you are weak; sometimes it means that you are strong enough to let go.
To climb steep hills requires a slow pace at first.
motivational.author: William Shakespeare

motivational.quote: An idea that is developed and put into action is more important than an idea that exists only as an idea.
motivational.author: Buddha

motivational.quote: It is not the possession of truth, but the success which attends the seeking after it, that enriches the seeker and brings happiness to him.
motivational.author: Max Planck

motivational.quote: Truth is generally the best vindication against slander.
motivational.author: Abraham Lincoln

motivational.quote: To follow, without halt, one aim: There is the secret of success.
motivational.author: Anna Pavlova

motivational.quote: And as we let our own light shine, we unconsciously give other people permission to do the same.
motivational.author: Nelson Mandela

motivational.quote: What is a weed? A plant whose virtues have not yet been discovered.
motivational.author: Ralph Emerson

motivational.quote: Belief consists in accepting the affirmations of the soul; Unbelief, in denying them.
motivational.author: Ralph Emerson

motivational.quote: Many people have gone further than they thought they could because someone else thought they could.
We read the world wrong and say that it deceives us.
motivational.author: Rabindranath Tagore

motivational.quote: If only wed stop trying to be happy wed have a pretty good time.
motivational.author: Edith Wharton

motivational.quote: You must do the things you think you cannot do.
motivational.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

motivational.quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
motivational.author: Oscar Wilde

motivational.quote: The mark of your ignorance is the depth of your belief in injustice and tragedy. What the caterpillar calls the end of the world, the Master calls the butterfly.
motivational.author: Richard Bach

motivational.quote: I am glad that I paid so little attention to good advice; had I abided by it I might have been saved from some of my most valuable mistakes.
motivational.author: Edna Millay

motivational.quote: Most folks are as happy as they make up their minds to be.
motivational.author: Abraham Lincoln

motivational.quote: Love is the master key that opens the gates of happiness.
motivational.author: Oliver Holmes

motivational.quote: The person who makes a success of living is the one who see his goal steadily and aims for it unswervingly. That is dedication.
motivational.author: Cecil B. DeMille

motivational.quote: My reputation grows with every failure.
motivational.author: George Shaw

motivational.quote: Good thoughts are no better than good dreams, unless they be executed.
motivational.author: Ralph Emerson

motivational.quote: Happiness does not come about only due to external circumstances; it mainly derives from inner attitudes.
motivational.author: Dalai Lama

motivational.quote: However many holy words you read, however many you speak, what good will they do you if you do not act on upon them?
motivational.author: Buddha

motivational.quote: For success, attitude is equally as important as ability.
motivational.author: Harry Banks

motivational.quote: If you are going to achieve excellence in big things, you develop the habit in little matters. Excellence is not an exception, it is a prevailing attitude.
motivational.author: Colin Powell

motivational.quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
motivational.author: Albert Einstein

motivational.quote: Better than a thousand hollow words is one word that brings peace.
motivational.author: Buddha

motivational.quote: The possibilities are numerous once we decide to act and not react.
motivational.author: George Bernard Shaw

motivational.quote: Almost everything comes from nothing.
motivational.author: Henri Amiel

motivational.quote: Sometimes by losing a battle you find a new way to win the war.
motivational.author: Donald Trump

motivational.quote: Listen to what you know instead of what you fear.
motivational.author: Richard Bach

motivational.quote: It is easier to live through someone else than to become complete yourself.
motivational.author: Betty Friedan

motivational.quote: If you're in a bad situation, don't worry it'll change. If you're in a good situation, don't worry it'll change.
motivational.author: John Simone

motivational.quote: Remember that failure is an event, not a person.
motivational.author: Zig Ziglar

motivational.quote: Don't settle for a relationship that won't let you be yourself.
motivational.author: Oprah Winfrey

motivational.quote: What the caterpillar calls the end of the world, the master calls a butterfly.
motivational.author: Richard Bach

motivational.quote: Instead of saying that man is the creature of circumstance, it would be nearer the mark to say that man is the architect of circumstance.
motivational.author: Thomas Carlyle

motivational.quote: If you do what you've always done, you'll get what youve always gotten.
motivational.author: Tony Robbins

motivational.quote: Do not wait for leaders; do it alone, person to person.
motivational.author: Mother Teresa

motivational.quote: Knowledge has three degrees opinion, science, illumination. The means or instrument of the first is sense; of the second, dialectic; of the third, intuition.
motivational.author: Plotinus

motivational.quote: Love vanquishes time. To lovers, a moment can be eternity, eternity can be the tick of a clock.
motivational.author: Mary Parrish

motivational.quote: We never live; we are always in the expectation of living.
motivational.author: Voltaire

motivational.quote: Think like a man of action; act like a man of thought.
motivational.author: Henri L. Bergson

motivational.quote: You can complain because roses have thorns, or you can rejoice because thorns have roses.
motivational.author: Ziggy

motivational.quote: There is not one big cosmic meaning for all, there is only the meaning we each give to our life.
motivational.author: Anais Nin

motivational.quote: A leader is best when people barely know he exists, when his work is done, his aim fulfilled, they will say: we did it ourselves.
motivational.author: Lao Tzu

motivational.quote: Time you enjoyed wasting was not wasted.
motivational.author: John Lennon

motivational.quote: You will never be happy if you continue to search for what happiness consists of. You will never live if you are looking for the meaning of life.
motivational.author: Albert Camus

motivational.quote: Genuine sincerity opens people's hearts, while manipulation causes them to close.
motivational.author: Daisaku Ikeda

motivational.quote: To give ones self earnestly to the duties due to men, and, while respecting spiritual beings, to keep aloof from them, may be called wisdom.
motivational.author: Confucius

motivational.quote: A man's dreams are an index to his greatness.
motivational.author: Zadok Rabinowitz

motivational.quote: This is the final test of a gentleman: his respect for those who can be of no possible value to him.
motivational.author: William Lyon Phelps

motivational.quote: You teach best what you most need to learn.
motivational.author: Richard Bach

motivational.quote: Continuous effort, not strength or intelligence is the key to unlocking our potential.
motivational.author: Winston Churchill

motivational.quote: Obstacles are those frightful things you see when you take your eyes off your goal.
motivational.author: Henry Ford

motivational.quote: Go for it now. The future is promised to no one.
motivational.author: Wayne Dyer

motivational.quote: Never tell a young person that anything cannot be done. God may have been waiting centuries for someone ignorant enough of the impossible to do that very thing.
motivational.author: John Holmes

motivational.quote: Bold is not the act of foolishness but the attribute and inner strength to act when others will not so as to move forward not backward.
motivational.author: Byron Pulsifer

motivational.quote: If we look at the world with a love of life, the world will reveal its beauty to us.
motivational.author: Daisaku Ikeda

motivational.quote: In skating over thin ice our safety is in our speed.
motivational.author: Ralph Emerson

motivational.quote: When you discover your mission, you will feel its demand. It will fill you with enthusiasm and a burning desire to get to work on it.
motivational.author: W. Clement Stone

motivational.quote: Never promise more than you can perform.
motivational.author: Publilius Syrus

motivational.quote: If you don't go after what you want, you'll never have it. If you don't ask, the answer is always no. If you don't step forward, you're always in the same place.
motivational.author: Nora Roberts

motivational.quote: I can't believe that God put us on this earth to be ordinary.
motivational.author: Lou Holtz

motivational.quote: There are no limitations to the mind except those we acknowledge.
motivational.author: Napoleon Hill

motivational.quote: It is through science that we prove, but through intuition that we discover.
motivational.author: Jules Poincare

motivational.quote: Don't be dismayed by good-byes. A farewell is necessary before you can meet again. And meeting again, after moments or lifetimes, is certain for those who are friends.
motivational.author: Richard Bach

motivational.quote: If someone in your life talked to you the way you talk to yourself, you would have left them long ago.
motivational.author: Carla Gordon

motivational.quote: The cosmos is neither moral or immoral; only people are. He who would move the world must first move himself.
motivational.author: Edward Ericson

motivational.quote: If you lose today, win tomorrow. In this never-ending spirit of challenge is the heart of a victor.
motivational.author: Daisaku Ikeda

motivational.quote: There is a way that nature speaks, that land speaks. Most of the time we are simply not patient enough, quiet enough, to pay attention to the story.
motivational.author: Linda Hogan

motivational.quote: Never tell me the sky is the limit when there are footprints on the moon.
I cannot say whether things will get better if we change; what I can say is they must change if they are to get better.
motivational.author: Georg Lichtenberg

motivational.quote: The greater part of human pain is unnecessary. It is self-created as long as the unobserved mind runs your life.
motivational.author: Eckhart Tolle

motivational.quote: Take it easy but take it.
motivational.author: Woody Guthrie

motivational.quote: Blessed is the man who expects nothing, for he shall never be disappointed.
motivational.author: Alexander Pope

motivational.quote: He who knows others is wise. He who knows himself is enlightened.
motivational.author: Lao Tzu

motivational.quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
motivational.author: Peter Drucker

motivational.quote: A garden is always a series of losses set against a few triumphs, like life itself.
motivational.author: May Sarton

motivational.quote: If facts are the seeds that later produce knowledge and wisdom, then the emotions and the impressions of the senses are the fertile soil in which the seeds must grow.
motivational.author: Rachel Carson

motivational.quote: Never mistake motion for action.
motivational.author: Ernest Hemingway

motivational.quote: One needs something to believe in, something for which one can have whole-hearted enthusiasm. One needs to feel that ones life has meaning, that one is needed in this world.
motivational.author: Hannah Senesh

motivational.quote: One who is too insistent on his own views, finds few to agree with him.
motivational.author: Lao Tzu

motivational.quote: Translation is the paradigm, the exemplar of all writing. It is translation that demonstrates most vividly the yearning for transformation that underlies every act involving speech, that supremely human gift.
motivational.author: Harry Burchell Mathews

motivational.quote: Meditation is the dissolution of thoughts in eternal awareness or Pure consciousness without objectification, knowing without thinking, merging finitude in infinity.
motivational.author: Voltaire

motivational.quote: The reasonable man adapts himself to the world; the unreasonable man persists in trying to adapt the world to himself. Therefore, all progress depends on the unreasonable man.
motivational.author: George Shaw

motivational.quote: Good instincts usually tell you what to do long before your head has figured it out.
motivational.author: Michael Burke

motivational.quote: It isn't what happens to us that causes us to suffer; it's what we say to ourselves about what happens.
motivational.author: Pema Chodron

motivational.quote: Those who dream by day are cognizant of many things which escape those who dream only by night.
motivational.author: Edgar Allan Poe

motivational.quote: We cannot hold a torch to light another's path without brightening our own.
motivational.author: Ben Sweetland

motivational.quote: You are never given a wish without also being given the power to make it come true. You may have to work for it, however.
motivational.author: Richard Bach

motivational.quote: Kind words can be short and easy to speak, but their echoes are truly endless.
motivational.author: Mother Teresa

motivational.quote: Count your joys instead of your woes. Count your friends instead of your foes.
Dreams come true. Without that possibility, nature would not incite us to have them.
motivational.author: John Updike

motivational.quote: Staying in one place is the best path to be taken over and surpassed by many.
motivational.author: Byron Pulsifer

motivational.quote: Imagination will often carry us to worlds that never were. But without it we go nowhere.
motivational.author: Carl Sagan

motivational.quote: When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us.
motivational.author: Helen Keller

motivational.quote: A leader or a man of action in a crisis almost always acts subconsciously and then thinks of the reasons for his action.
motivational.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

motivational.quote: I have no special talent. I am only passionately curious.
motivational.author: Albert Einstein

motivational.quote: I endeavour to be wise when I cannot be merry, easy when I cannot be glad, content with what cannot be mended and patient when there is no redress.
motivational.author: Elizabeth Montagu

motivational.quote: The height of your accomplishments will equal the depth of your convictions.
motivational.author: William Scolavino

motivational.quote: If I am not for myself, who will be for me? If I am not for others, what am I? And if not now, when?
motivational.author: Rabbi Hillel

motivational.quote: When I dare to be powerful, to use my strength in the service of my vision, then it becomes less and less important whether I am afraid.
motivational.author: Audre Lorde

motivational.quote: All great men are gifted with intuition. They know without reasoning or analysis, what they need to know.
motivational.author: Alexis Carrel

motivational.quote: To get the full value of joy you must have someone to divide it with.
motivational.author: Mark Twain

motivational.quote: Sometimes our fate resembles a fruit tree in winter. Who would think that those branches would turn green again and blossom, but we hope it, we know it.
motivational.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

motivational.quote: We lost because we told ourselves we lost.
motivational.author: Leo Tolstoy

motivational.quote: Success is determined by those whom prove the impossible, possible.
motivational.author: James Pence

motivational.quote: Good advice is always certain to be ignored, but that's no reason not to give it.
motivational.author: Agatha Christie

motivational.quote: The winner ain't the one with the fastest car it's the one who refuses to lose.
motivational.author: Dale Earnhardt

motivational.quote: Spirituality can be severed from both vicious sectarianism and thoughtless banalities. Spirituality, I have come to see, is nothing less than the thoughtful love of life.
motivational.author: Robert C. Solomon

motivational.quote: No one has a finer command of language than the person who keeps his mouth shut.
motivational.author: Sam Rayburn

motivational.quote: The only person who never makes mistakes is the person who never does anything.
motivational.author: Denis Waitley

motivational.quote: Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans.
motivational.author: John Lennon

motivational.quote: Discovery consists of seeing what everybody has seen and thinking what nobody else has thought.
motivational.author: Jonathan Swift

motivational.quote: If you have knowledge, let others light their candles in it.
motivational.author: Margaret Fuller

motivational.quote: It is impossible for a man to learn what he thinks he already knows.
motivational.author: Epictetus

motivational.quote: If you find yourself in a hole, the first thing to do is stop digging.
motivational.author: Will Rogers

motivational.quote: To make no mistakes is not in the power of man; but from their errors and mistakes the wise and good learn wisdom for the future.
motivational.author: Plutarch

motivational.quote: I think you can have moderate success by copying something else, but if you really want to knock it out of the park, you have to do something different and take chances.
motivational.author: Lee Womack

motivational.quote: Everything we hear is an opinion, not a fact. Everything we see is a perspective, not the truth.
motivational.author: Marcus Aurelius

motivational.quote: Six essential qualities that are the key to success: Sincerity, personal integrity, humility, courtesy, wisdom, charity.
motivational.author: William Menninger

motivational.quote: I have an everyday religion that works for me. Love yourself first, and everything else falls into line.
motivational.author: Lucille Ball

motivational.quote: Flow with whatever is happening and let your mind be free. Stay centred by accepting whatever you are doing. This is the ultimate.
motivational.author: Chuang Tzu

motivational.quote: Nothing could be worse than the fear that one had given up too soon, and left one unexpended effort that might have saved the world.
motivational.author: Jane Addams

motivational.quote: The energy of the mind is the essence of life.
motivational.author: Aristotle

motivational.quote: Begin, be bold, and venture to be wise.
motivational.author: Horace

motivational.quote: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach him how to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.
motivational.author: Lao Tzu

motivational.quote: A wise man will make more opportunities than he finds.
motivational.author: Francis Bacon

motivational.quote: Slow down and enjoy life. It's not only the scenery you miss by going too fast you also miss the sense of where you are going and why.
motivational.author: Eddie Cantor

motivational.quote: Miracles come in moments. Be ready and willing.
motivational.author: Wayne Dyer

motivational.quote: Numberless are the worlds wonders, but none more wonderful than man.
motivational.author: Sophocles

motivational.quote: So is cheerfulness, or a good temper, the more it is spent, the more remains.
motivational.author: Ralph Emerson

motivational.quote: The true way to render ourselves happy is to love our work and find in it our pleasure.
motivational.author: Francoise de Motteville

motivational.quote: When you judge another, you do not define them, you define yourself.
motivational.author: Wayne Dyer

motivational.quote: Argue for your limitations, and sure enough they're yours.
motivational.author: Richard Bach

motivational.quote: He who wishes to secure the good of others, has already secured his own.
motivational.author: Confucius

motivational.quote: Wise men talk because they have something to say; fools, because they have to say something.
motivational.author: Plato

motivational.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
motivational.author: Confucius

entrepreneurship.quote: A business that makes nothing but money is a poor business.
entrepreneurship.author: Henry Ford

entrepreneurship.quote: After a certain point, money is meaningless. It ceases to be the goal. The game is what counts.
entrepreneurship.author: Aristotle

entrepreneurship.quote: I treat business a bit like a computer game. I count money as points. I'm doing really well: making lots of money and lots of points.
entrepreneurship.author: Michael Dunlop

entrepreneurship.quote: All of my friends were doing babysitting jobs. I wanted money without the job.
entrepreneurship.author: Adam Horwitz

entrepreneurship.quote: I don't pay good wages because I have a lot of money; I have a lot of money because I pay good wages.
entrepreneurship.author: Robert Bosch

entrepreneurship.quote: Lend your friend $20. If he doesn't pay you back then he's not your friend. Money well spent.
entrepreneurship.author: Ted Nicolas

entrepreneurship.quote: Money and success don't change people; they merely amplify what is already there.
entrepreneurship.author: Will Smith

entrepreneurship.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
entrepreneurship.author: Agatha Christie

entrepreneurship.quote: Hire character. Train skill.
entrepreneurship.author: Peter Schultz

entrepreneurship.quote: In preparing for battle I have always found that plans are useless, but planning is indispensable.
entrepreneurship.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

entrepreneurship.quote: You've got to stop doing all the things that people have tried, tested, and found out don't work.
entrepreneurship.author: Michael Dunlop

entrepreneurship.quote: I never perfected an invention that I did not think about in terms of the service it might give others… I find out what the world needs, then I proceed to invent.
entrepreneurship.author: Thomas Edison

entrepreneurship.quote: If you're not making mistakes, then you're not making decisions.
entrepreneurship.author: Catherine Cook

entrepreneurship.quote: Your most unhappy customers are your greatest source of learning.
entrepreneurship.author: Bill Gates

entrepreneurship.quote: One can get anything if he is willing to help enough others get what they want.
entrepreneurship.author: Zig Ziglar

entrepreneurship.quote: An entrepreneur tends to bite off a little more than he can chew hoping he'll quickly learn how to chew it.
entrepreneurship.author: Roy Ash

entrepreneurship.quote: The true entrepreneur is a doer, not a dreamer.
entrepreneurship.author: Nolan Bushnell

entrepreneurship.quote: Whenever you are asked if you can do a job, tell 'em, ‘Certainly, I can!' Then get busy and find out how to do it.
entrepreneurship.author: Theodore Roosevelt

entrepreneurship.quote: Everything started as nothing.
entrepreneurship.author: Ben Weissenstein

entrepreneurship.quote: If you start with nothing and end up with nothing, there's nothing lost.
entrepreneurship.author: Michael Dunlop

entrepreneurship.quote: Start today, not tomorrow. If anything, you should have started yesterday.
entrepreneurship.author: Emil Motycka

entrepreneurship.quote: Make it happen now, not tomorrow. Tomorrow is a loser's excuse.
entrepreneurship.author: Andrew Fashion

entrepreneurship.quote: Every day I get up and look through the Forbes list of the richest people in America. If I'm not there, I go to work.
entrepreneurship.author: Robert Orben

entrepreneurship.quote: Entrepreneurship is living a few years of your life like most people won't, so that you can spend the rest of your life like most people can't.
entrepreneurship.author: Anonymous

entrepreneurship.quote: Yesterday's home runs don't win today's games.
entrepreneurship.author: Babe Ruth

entrepreneurship.quote: You should always stay hungry. Stay hungry, so you can eat.
entrepreneurship.author: Syed Balkhi

entrepreneurship.quote: If you're not living life on the edge, you're taking up too much space.
entrepreneurship.author: Anonymous

entrepreneurship.quote: I wasn't satisfied just to earn a good living. I was looking to make a statement.
entrepreneurship.author: Donald Trump

entrepreneurship.quote: Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.
entrepreneurship.author: Thomas Edison

entrepreneurship.quote: You must either modify your dreams or magnify your skills.
entrepreneurship.author: Jim Rohn

entrepreneurship.quote: Keep away from people who try to belittle your ambitions. Small people always do that, but the really great make you feel that you, too, can become great.
entrepreneurship.author: Mark Twain

entrepreneurship.quote: Not a single person whose name is worth remembering lived a life of ease.
entrepreneurship.author: Ryan P. Allis

entrepreneurship.quote: If you think that you are going to love something, give it a try. You're going to kick yourself in the butt for the rest of your life if you don't.
entrepreneurship.author: Joe Penna

entrepreneurship.quote: The best time to plant a tree is twenty years ago. The second best time is now.
entrepreneurship.author: Chinese Proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: If you want one year of prosperity, grow grain. If you want ten years of prosperity, grow trees. If you want one hundred years of prosperity, grow people.
entrepreneurship.author: Chinese Proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: Vision without action is a daydream. Action without vision is a nightmare.
entrepreneurship.author: Japanese Proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: Sow a thought, reap an action; sow an action, reap a habit; sow a habit, reap a character; sow a character, reap a destiny.
entrepreneurship.author: Chinese Proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: A bad workman blames his tools.
entrepreneurship.author: Chinese Proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: A fall into a ditch makes you wiser.
entrepreneurship.author: Chinese Proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: Defeat isn't bitter if you don't swallow it.
entrepreneurship.author: Chinese Proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: The diamond cannot be polished without friction, nor the man perfected without trials.
entrepreneurship.author: Chinese Proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: A jade stone is useless before it is processed; a man is good-for-nothing until he is educated.
entrepreneurship.author: Chinese Proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
entrepreneurship.author: Chinese Proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: The loftiest towers rise from the ground.
entrepreneurship.author: Chinese Proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: Building a castle is difficult. Defending and maintaining it is harder still.
entrepreneurship.author: Asian Proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: A person who says it cannot be done should not interrupt the man doing it.
entrepreneurship.author: Chinese Proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: All cats love fish but fear to wet their paws.
entrepreneurship.author: Chinese Proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: Don't stand by the water and long for fish; go home and weave a net.
entrepreneurship.author: Chinese Proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: Everyone should carefully observe which way his heart draws him, and then choose that way with all his strength.
entrepreneurship.author: Hasidic Proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: Failing to plan is planning to fail.
entrepreneurship.author: Chinese Proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: If you pay peanuts, you get monkeys.
entrepreneurship.author: Chinese Proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: Make happy those who are near, and those who are far will come.
entrepreneurship.author: Chinese Proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: Teachers open the door. You enter by yourself.
entrepreneurship.author: Chinese Proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: Find a job you love and you'll never work a day in your life.
entrepreneurship.author: Confucius

entrepreneurship.quote: The entrepreneur builds an enterprise; the technician builds a job.
entrepreneurship.author: Michael Gerber

entrepreneurship.quote: If you want to be inventive
entrepreneurship.author: you have to be willing to fail.”

entrepreneurship.quote: The challenge is not just to build a company that can endure; but to build one that is worthy of enduring.
entrepreneurship.author: Jim Collins

entrepreneurship.quote: Success is a lousy teacher. It seduces smart people into thinking they can't lose.
entrepreneurship.author: Bill Gates

entrepreneurship.quote: Don't treat your customers like a bunch of purses and wallets.
entrepreneurship.author: Chris Brogan

entrepreneurship.quote: Nine out of ten businesses fail; so I came up with a foolproof plan
entrepreneurship.author: create ten businesses.”

entrepreneurship.quote: I'm not a businessman
entrepreneurship.author: I”m a business, man.”

entrepreneurship.quote: If plan ‘A' fails
entrepreneurship.author: remember you have 25 letters left.”

entrepreneurship.quote: We make a living by what we get. But we make a life by what we give.
entrepreneurship.author: Winston Churchhill

entrepreneurship.quote: Believe that you will succeed
entrepreneurship.author: and you will.”

entrepreneurship.quote: Victory comes only after many struggles and countless defeats.
entrepreneurship.author: Og Mandino

entrepreneurship.quote: As long as you're going to be thinking anyway, think big.
entrepreneurship.author: Donald Trump

entrepreneurship.quote: Success is how high you bounce after you hit bottom
entrepreneurship.author: General George Patton

entrepreneurship.quote: Remembering you are going to die is the best way I know to avoid the trap of thinking you have something to lose.
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: It's not about how to get started; its about how to get noticed.
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Case

entrepreneurship.quote: A ship in harbor is safe, but that's not what ships are for.
entrepreneurship.author: John Shedd

entrepreneurship.quote: If I find 10,000 ways something won't work, I haven't failed. I am not discouraged, because every wrong attempt discarded is often a step forward.
entrepreneurship.author: Thomas Edison

entrepreneurship.quote: Business opportunities are like buses, there's always another one coming.
entrepreneurship.author: Richard Branson

entrepreneurship.quote: If we don't allow ourselves to make mistakes, we will never invest in things that are radical.
entrepreneurship.author: Jeff Clavier

entrepreneurship.quote: The critical ingredient is getting off your butt and doing something.
entrepreneurship.author: Nolan Bushnell

entrepreneurship.quote: Nothing will work unless you do.
entrepreneurship.author: Maya Angelou

entrepreneurship.quote: Try not to be a man of success, but rather try to become a man of value.
entrepreneurship.author: Albert Einstein

entrepreneurship.quote: You won't get anything unless you have the vision to imagine it.
entrepreneurship.author: John Lennon

entrepreneurship.quote: A man must be big enough to admit his mistakes, smart enough to profit from them, and strong enough to correct them.
entrepreneurship.author: John C. Maxwell

entrepreneurship.quote: In the modern world of business, it is useless to be a creative, original thinker unless you can also sell what you create.
entrepreneurship.author: David Ogilvy

entrepreneurship.quote: Success is doing what you want, where you want, when you want, with whom you want as much as you want.
entrepreneurship.author: Tony Robbins

entrepreneurship.quote: If you don't have a competitive advantage
entrepreneurship.author: don't compete.”

entrepreneurship.quote: You were born to win, but to be a winner, you must plan to win, prepare to win, and expect to win.
entrepreneurship.author: Zig Ziglar

entrepreneurship.quote: If everything seems under control, you're just not going fast enough.
entrepreneurship.author: Mario Andretti

entrepreneurship.quote: Don't be trapped by dogma
entrepreneurship.author: which is living with the results of other people's thinking.”

entrepreneurship.quote: Do or do not. There is no try.
entrepreneurship.author: Yoda

entrepreneurship.quote: Show me a person who never made a mistake, and I will show you a person who never did anything.
entrepreneurship.author: William Rosenberg, founder of Dunkin' Donuts

entrepreneurship.quote: Ideas are commodity. Execution of them is not.
entrepreneurship.author: Michael Dell, CEO of Dell

entrepreneurship.quote: User experience is everything. It always has been, but it's undervalued and underinvested in. If you don't know user-centered design, study it. Hire people who know it. Obsess over it. Live and breathe it. Get your whole company on board.
entrepreneurship.author: Evan Williams, co-founder of Twitter

entrepreneurship.quote: A pessimist sees the difficulty in every opportunity; an optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty.
entrepreneurship.author: Winston Churchill, British Prime Minister

entrepreneurship.quote: The man who does not work for the love of work but only for money is likely to neither make money nor find much fun in life.
entrepreneurship.author: Charles M. Schwab, American steel magnate

entrepreneurship.quote: Be undeniably good. No marketing effort or social media buzzword can be a substitute for that.
entrepreneurship.author: Anthony Volodkin, founder of Hype Machine

entrepreneurship.quote: Ideas are easy. Implementation is hard.
entrepreneurship.author: Guy Kawasaki, founder of AllTop

entrepreneurship.quote: You can say anything to anyone, but how you say it will determine how they will react.
entrepreneurship.author: John Rampton, entrepreneur and investor

entrepreneurship.quote: Always deliver more than expected.
entrepreneurship.author: Larry Page, co-founder of Google

entrepreneurship.quote: Assume you have 90 seconds with a new user before they decide to use your app or delete it.
entrepreneurship.author: Tamara Steffens, Acompli

entrepreneurship.quote: Even if you don't have the perfect idea to begin with, you can likely adapt.
entrepreneurship.author: Victoria Ransom, co-founder of Wildfire Interactive

entrepreneurship.quote: Make your team feel respected, empowered and genuinely excited about the company's mission.
entrepreneurship.author: Tim Westergen, founder of Pandora

entrepreneurship.quote: Stay self-funded as long as possible.
entrepreneurship.author: Garrett Camp, co-founder of Stumbleupon

entrepreneurship.quote: In between goals is a thing called life, that has to be lived and enjoyed.
entrepreneurship.author: Sid Caesar, Entertainer

entrepreneurship.quote: Wonder what your customer really wants? Ask. Don't tell.
entrepreneurship.author: Lisa Stone, co-founder of BlogHer

entrepreneurship.quote: When times are bad is when the real entrepreneurs emerge.
entrepreneurship.author: Robert Kiyosaki, author of Rich Dad Poor Dad

entrepreneurship.quote: What do you need to start a business? Three simple things: know your product better than anyone, know your customer, and have a burning desire to succeed.
entrepreneurship.author: Dave Thomas, founder of Wendy's

entrepreneurship.quote: Get big quietly, so you don't tip off potential competitors.
entrepreneurship.author: Chris Dixon, co-founder of Hunch

entrepreneurship.quote: Don't worry about failure; you only have to be right once.
entrepreneurship.author: Drew Houston, founder of Dropbox

entrepreneurship.quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma
entrepreneurship.author: which is living with the results of other people's thinking. Don't let the noise of other's opinions drown out your own inner voice. And most important, have the courage to follow your heart and intuition. They somehow already know what you truly want to become. Everything else is secondary.”

entrepreneurship.quote: Don't be cocky. Don't be flashy. There's always someone better than you.
entrepreneurship.author: Tony Hsieh, Zappos.com CEO

entrepreneurship.quote: Don't take too much advice. Most people who have a lot of advice to give — with a few exceptions — generalize whatever they did. Don't over-analyze everything. I myself have been guilty of over-thinking problems. Just build things and find out if they work.
entrepreneurship.author: Ben Silbermann, co-founder of Pinterest

entrepreneurship.quote: Openly share and talk to people about your idea. Use their lack of interest or doubt to fuel your motivation to make it happen.
entrepreneurship.author: Todd Garland, founder of BuySellAds

entrepreneurship.quote: How you climb a mountain is more important than reaching the top.
entrepreneurship.author: Yvon Chouinard, founder of Patagonia

entrepreneurship.quote: Associate yourself with people of good quality, for it is better to be alone than in bad company.
entrepreneurship.author: Booker T. Washington, Educator and author

entrepreneurship.quote: It's fine to celebrate success but it is more important to heed the lessons of failure.
entrepreneurship.author: Bill Gates, co-founder of Microsoft

entrepreneurship.quote: It takes 20 years to build a reputation and five minutes to ruin it. If you think about that, you'll do things differently.
entrepreneurship.author: Warren Buffett, Investor

entrepreneurship.quote: Statistics suggest that when customers complain, business owners and managers ought to get excited about it. The complaining customer represents a huge opportunity for more business.
entrepreneurship.author: Zig Ziglar, author and motivational speaker

entrepreneurship.quote: There is only one success- to be able to spend your life in your own way.
entrepreneurship.author: Christopher Morley, journalist

entrepreneurship.quote: Formal education will make you a living; self-education will make you a fortune.
entrepreneurship.author: Jim Rohn, author and speaker

entrepreneurship.quote: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
entrepreneurship.author: Henry Ford, founder of Ford Motor Company

entrepreneurship.quote: Rarely have I seen a situation where doing less than the other guy is a good strategy.
entrepreneurship.author: Jimmy Spithill, Australian yachtsman

entrepreneurship.quote: You miss 100 percent of the shots you don't take.
entrepreneurship.author: Wayne Gretzky, NHL Hall of Famer

entrepreneurship.quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
entrepreneurship.author: Chinese proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: The secret to successful hiring is this: look for the people who want to change the world.
entrepreneurship.author: Marc Benioff, CEO of Salesforce

entrepreneurship.quote: Twenty years from now, you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do, so throw off the bowlines, sail away from safe harbor, catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore, Dream, Discover.
entrepreneurship.author: Mark Twain, author

entrepreneurship.quote: If you've got an idea, start today. There's no better time than now to get going. That doesn't mean quit your job and jump into your idea 100% from day one, but there's always small progress that can be made to start the movement.
entrepreneurship.author: Kevin Systrom, co-founder of Instagram

entrepreneurship.quote: It's almost always harder to raise capital than you thought it would be, and it always takes longer. So plan for that.
entrepreneurship.author: Richard Harroch, Venture Capitalist

entrepreneurship.quote: For all of the most important things, the timing always sucks. Waiting for a good time to quit your job? The stars will never align and the traffic lights of life will never all be green at the same time. The universe doesn't conspire against you, but it doesn't go out of its way to line up the pins either. Conditions are never perfect. Someday is a disease that will take your dreams to the grave with you. Pro and con lists are just as bad. If it's important to you and you want to do it eventually, just do it and correct course along the way.
entrepreneurship.author: Timothy Ferriss, author of The 4-Hour Work Week

entrepreneurship.quote: I don't have big ideas. I sometimes have small ideas, which seem to work out.
entrepreneurship.author: Matt Mullenweg, founder of Automattic

entrepreneurship.quote: Fail often so you can succeed sooner.
entrepreneurship.author: Tom Kelley, Ideo partner

entrepreneurship.quote: When you cease to dream you cease to live.
entrepreneurship.author: Malcolm Forbes, chairman and editor in chief of Forbes Magazine

entrepreneurship.quote: Whatever the mind can conceive and believe, the mind can achieve.
entrepreneurship.author: Dr. Napoleon Hill, author of Think and Grow Rich

entrepreneurship.quote: Running a start-up is like eating glass. You just start to like the taste of your own blood.
entrepreneurship.author: Sean Parker, co-founder of Napster

entrepreneurship.quote: My number one piece of advice is: you should learn how to program.
entrepreneurship.author: Mark Zuckerberg, founder of Facebook

entrepreneurship.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
entrepreneurship.author: Walt Disney, co-founder of the Walt Disney Company

entrepreneurship.quote: The pace of change for entrepreneurs is rapidly accelerating, and the cost and risk of launching a new business and getting off the ground is just amazing. The ability to gain user feedback really quickly and adapt to what your consumers want is totally different with the web as it is now. But finding a new market, helping people and taking that original idea and turning it into a business is really exciting right now.
entrepreneurship.author: Matt Mickiewicz, co-founder of 99 Designs

entrepreneurship.quote: Building and hanging on to an audience is the biggest role of social media.
entrepreneurship.author: Matthew Inman, The Oatmeal

entrepreneurship.quote: Every feature has some maintenance cost, and having fewer features lets us focus on the ones we care about and make sure they work very well.
entrepreneurship.author: David Karp, founder of Tumblr

entrepreneurship.quote: A poorly implemented feature hurts more than not having it at all.
entrepreneurship.author: Noah Everett, founder of Twitpic

entrepreneurship.quote: This defines entrepreneur and entrepreneurship
entrepreneurship.author: the entrepreneur always searches for change, responds to it, and exploits it as an opportunity.”― Peter F. Drucker, educator and author

entrepreneurship.quote: You don't learn to walk by following rules. You learn by doing and falling over.
entrepreneurship.author: Richard Branson, founder of Virgin Group

entrepreneurship.quote: The fastest way to change yourself is to hang out with people who are already the way you want to be.
entrepreneurship.author: Reid Hoffman, co-founder of Linkedin

entrepreneurship.quote: Risk more than others think is safe. Dream more than others think is practical.
entrepreneurship.author: Howard Schultz, CEO of Starbucks

entrepreneurship.quote: You shouldn't focus on why you can't do something, which is what most people do. You should focus on why perhaps you can, and be one of the exceptions.
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Case, co-founder of AOL

entrepreneurship.quote: The critical ingredient is getting off your butt and doing something. It's as simple as that. A lot of people have ideas, but there are few who decide to do something about them now. Not tomorrow. Not next week. But today. The true entrepreneur is a doer not a dreamer.
entrepreneurship.author: Nolan Bushnell, founder of Atari

entrepreneurship.quote: If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.
entrepreneurship.author: Napoleon Hill, author

entrepreneurship.quote: Success is not what you have, but who you are.
entrepreneurship.author: Bo Bennet, author and entreprenuer

entrepreneurship.quote: One of the huge mistakes people make is that they try to force an interest on themselves. You don't choose your passions; your passions choose you.
entrepreneurship.author: Jeff Bezos, founder and CEO of Amazon.com

entrepreneurship.quote: Lots of companies don't succeed over time. What do they fundamentally do wrong? They usually miss the future.
entrepreneurship.author: Larry Page, CEO of Google

entrepreneurship.quote: It takes humility to realize that we don't know everything, not to rest on our laurels and know that we must keep learning and observing. If we don't, we can be sure some startup will be there to take our place.
entrepreneurship.author: Cher Wang, CEO of HTC

entrepreneurship.quote: There's an entrepreneur right now, scared to death, making excuses, saying, ‘It's not the right time just yet.' There's no such thing as a good time. Get out of your garage and go take a chance, and start your business.
entrepreneurship.author: Kevin Plank, CEO of Under Armour

entrepreneurship.quote: Be really picky with your hiring, and hire the absolute best people you possibly can. People are the most important component of almost every business, and attracting the best talent possible is going to make a huge difference.
entrepreneurship.author: Peter Berg, founder of October Three

entrepreneurship.quote: Worry about being better; bigger will take care of itself. Think one customer at a time and take care of each one the best way you can.
entrepreneurship.author: Gary Comer, founder of Land's End

entrepreneurship.quote: You have a viable business only if your product is either better or cheaper than the alternatives. If it's not one or the other, you might make some money at first, but it's not a sustainable business.
entrepreneurship.author: Jim Koch, founder of Boston Beer Co.

entrepreneurship.quote: Every time I took these bigger risks, the opportunity for a bigger payout was always there.
entrepreneurship.author: Casey Neistat, filmmaker

entrepreneurship.quote: If you can do something to get somebody excited — not everybody — but if you can be the best for somebody, then you can win.
entrepreneurship.author: Ron Shaich, founder and CEO of Panera Bread

entrepreneurship.quote: Would you like me to give you a formula for success? It's quite simple, really: Double your rate of failure. You are thinking of failure as the enemy of success. But it isn't at all. You can be discouraged by failure or you can learn from it, so go ahead and make mistakes. Make all you can. Because remember that's where you will find success.
entrepreneurship.author: Thomas J. Watson, businessman

entrepreneurship.quote: People who succeed have momentum. The more they succeed, the more they want to succeed, and the more they find a way to succeed. Similarly, when someone is failing, the tendency is to get on a downward spiral that can even become a self-fulfilling prophecy.
entrepreneurship.author: Tony Robbins, motivational speaker

entrepreneurship.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
entrepreneurship.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

entrepreneurship.quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
entrepreneurship.author: Bruce Lee, actor and martial arts instructor

entrepreneurship.quote: Fall seven times and stand up eight.
entrepreneurship.author: Japanese proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: The successful man is the one who finds out what is the matter with his business before his competitors do.
entrepreneurship.author: Roy L. Smith, animator and film director

entrepreneurship.quote: There's no shortage of remarkable ideas, what's missing is the will to execute them.
entrepreneurship.author: Seth Godin, author and speaker

entrepreneurship.quote: Keep on going, and the chances are that you will stumble on something, perhaps when you are least expecting it. I never heard of anyone ever stumbling on something sitting down.
entrepreneurship.author: Charles F. Kettering, inventor

entrepreneurship.quote: A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him.
entrepreneurship.author: David Brinkley, newscaster

entrepreneurship.quote: Everyone is a genius. But if you judge a fish by its ability to climb a tree, it will spend its whole life believing it is stupid.
entrepreneurship.author: Albert Einstein, Theoretical Physicist

entrepreneurship.quote: Success in business requires training and discipline and hard work. But if you're not frightened by these things, the opportunities are just as great today as they ever were.
entrepreneurship.author: David Rockefeller, American banker

entrepreneurship.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
entrepreneurship.author: George Eliot, journalist and novelist

entrepreneurship.quote: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
entrepreneurship.author: Stephen Covey, author and businessman

entrepreneurship.quote: There is only one way to avoid criticism: Do nothing, say nothing, and be nothing.
entrepreneurship.author: Aristotle, Greek philosopher

entrepreneurship.quote: Build your own dreams, or someone else will hire you to build theirs.
entrepreneurship.author: Farrah Gray, investor and motivational speaker

entrepreneurship.quote: You may be disappointed if you fail, but you are doomed if you don't try.
entrepreneurship.author: Beverly Sills, operatic soprano
